---
title: "Assignment5"
---


1.  Using sample datasets or own data, create the following charts using only R graphics functions (i.e. without using any other packages). Be sure you customize the chart with your own style/theme (e.g. font, color, pch, etc.)

<!-- -->

a.  Histogram


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggplot2)

data<-mpg

## a. Histogram.
hist(mpg$hwy, 
     main="Histogram of Highway MPG", 
     col="lightblue", 
     border="darkblue", 
     xlab="Highway MPG", 
     ylab="Frequency", 
     font.main=2, font.lab=4)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](assignment5_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


b.  Barchart
c.  Vertical


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
barplot(table(mpg$class), 
        main="Bar Chart of Car Classes", 
        col="coral", 
        xlab="Car Class", 
        ylab="Frequency", 
        font.main=2)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](assignment5_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


ii. Horizontal


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
barplot(table(mpg$class), 
        main="Horizontal Bar Chart of Car Classes", 
        col="lightgreen", 
        horiz=TRUE, 
        xlab="Frequency", 
        ylab="Car Class", 
        font.main=2)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](assignment5_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


c.  Piechart


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pie(table(mpg$class), 
    main="Pie Chart of Car Classes", 
    col=rainbow(length(unique(mpg$class))), 
    font.main=2)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](assignment5_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


d.  Boxplot


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
boxplot(hwy ~ class, data=mpg, 
        main="Boxplot of Highway MPG by Car Class", 
        col=c("skyblue", "pink", "lightgreen"), 
        xlab="Car Class", 
        ylab="Highway MPG", 
        border="darkred", 
        font.main=2)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](assignment5_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


e.  Scatterplot


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(mpg$displ, mpg$hwy, 
     main="Scatterplot of Displacement vs Highway MPG", 
     xlab="Displacement (liters)", 
     ylab="Highway MPG", 
     col="blue", 
     pch=16, 
     font.main=2, font.lab=4)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](assignment5_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


2.  Repeat 1 using ggplot2, with your own style

<!-- -->

a.  Histogram


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(mpg, aes(x=hwy)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth=1, fill="lightblue", color="darkblue") +
  ggtitle("Histogram of Highway MPG") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(face="bold"))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](assignment5_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


b.  Bar Chart
c.  Vertical


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(mpg, aes(x=class)) +
  geom_bar(fill="coral") +
  ggtitle("Bar Chart of Car Classes") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(face="bold"))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](assignment5_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


ii. Horizontal


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(mpg, aes(x=class)) +
  geom_bar(fill="lightgreen") +
  coord_flip() +
  ggtitle("Horizontal Bar Chart of Car Classes") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(face="bold"))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](assignment5_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-9-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


c.  Pie Chart


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(mpg, aes(x="", fill=class)) +
  geom_bar(width=1) +
  coord_polar(theta="y") +
  ggtitle("Pie Chart of Car Classes") +
  theme_void() +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(face="bold"))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](assignment5_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-10-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


d.  Boxplot


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(mpg, aes(x=class, y=hwy, fill=class)) +
  geom_boxplot(color="darkred") +
  ggtitle("Boxplot of Highway MPG by Car Class") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(face="bold")) +
  scale_fill_manual(values=c("skyblue", "pink", "lightgreen", "yellow", "purple", "orange", "red"))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](assignment5_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-11-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


e.  Scatterplot


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(mpg, aes(x=displ, y=hwy)) +
  geom_point(color="blue", size=3) +
  ggtitle("Scatterplot of Displacement vs Highway MPG") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(face="bold"))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](assignment5_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-12-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
